DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate interactive web-based teach tool IVF patient . Patients randomized participate web-based IVF teaching didactic lecture . A knowledge questionnaire complete prior follow teach intervention . Both group also complete stress satisfaction survey throughout IVF treatment cycle . Groups compare completion study demographic , level knowledge , stress satisfaction . The web-based group evaluate web usage .
DOC.brief_title: Development Interactive Web-based Teaching Tool Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Patients
DOC.criteria: Subject > 18 year age Able provide inform consent First cycle IVF English speak read Internet access home work ( easily accessible personal use ) Failure complete baseline knowledge questionnaire prior IVF consent sign Previous attendance IVF teach session Previous IVF treatment ( Ottawa Fertility Centre IVF clinic ) Undergoing Natural Cycle IVF ( patient generally participate teach session , undergo oneonone teaching )
